name: interpret_dream
description: Interpret a user's dream and provide psychological analysis

dreamTitle.description: A brief, evocative title for the dream that captures its essence

dreamSummary.description: A concise summary of the dream in 2-3 sentences, focusing on the key events and emotions

fullInterpretation.description: A detailed psychological interpretation of the dream, including potential meanings, symbolism, and insights about the dreamer's subconscious mind. This should be comprehensive and provide meaningful analysis.

emoji.description: An emoji representing the mood or emotion

label.description: The name of the mood or emotion

score.description: A score between 0.0 and 1.0 representing the intensity of this mood in the dream

moodInsights.description: Array of mood insights reflecting the emotional tone of the dream. Include 3-5 different emotions with their intensity scores.

icon.description: An emoji or symbol representing the dream element or symbol

meaning.description: The psychological meaning and significance of this symbol in the context of the dream

symbolism.description: Array of symbolic elements and their psychological meanings. Identify 3-5 key symbols from the dream and explain their significance.

reflectionPrompts.description: Array of thoughtful questions to encourage self-reflection about the dream. Include 3-4 questions that help the dreamer explore the meaning and relevance of their dream.

text.description: An inspirational or insightful quote about dreams, psychology, or self-discovery that relates to the dream's themes

quote.description: An inspirational quote related to dreams, psychology, or the themes present in this dream
